claim: A new pandemic has started in China, and there are already cases in Europe and in other Asian countries. A type of swine flu is spreading to humans.
label: FALSE

claim: Denis Mukwege, Nobel Award laureate, resigned his post as head of a commitee to deal with the pandemic after being asked to forge the number of COVID-19 cases and deaths.
label: FALSE

claim: Italy, Spain and the United Kingdom “present zero cases” of Covid-19 to attract tourists.
label: FALSE

claim: A video shot in an empty Brazilian emergency hospital, which would therefore infirm the presence of a new spike in Covid-19 cases in the country.
label: FALSE

claim: Osmania Hospital in Hyderabad cannot bear the burden of COVID-19 cases as corpses lay stacked outside the hospital
label: FALSE

claim: The Philippines has the lowest number of COVID-19 cases and fatalities in Asia.
label: FALSE

claim: The Chinese embassy advised its citizens in a neighbourhood of Madrid to close the shops after new coronavirus cases in China.
label: FALSE

claim: A Facebook post claiming that Google is creating new, original articles everytime users type a number followed by “new cases”, in order to keep the “pandemic hoax” alive.
label: FALSE

claim: The mayor of Pereira hit the number of active cases of COVID-19 on May 24, but its comparison with previous dates is not accurate.
label: Partially false

claim: COVID-19 cases are “up only because of our big number testing” in the United States.
label: FALSE

claim: Alberto Fernández (President of Argentina), on the increase in cases in Buenos Aires
label: No evidence

claim: ICMR study claims COVID-19 cases to peak in mid November causing paucity of ICUs and Ventilators.
label: FALSE

claim: “In a very real sense, (Oklahoma has) flattened the curve. … The number of cases in Oklahoma — it’s declined precipitously.”
label: FALSE

claim: Brazil’s health minister says cases with no confirmation of COVID-19 won’t be considered on death toll.
label: FALSE

claim: “If we stopped testing right now, we’d have very few cases, if any.”
label: FALSE
